thread.title: Gary Sikorski
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Gary Sikorski

author: Gary Sikorski
title: Gary Sikorski
text: In store experience was great. Sales staff extremely helpful and never pushy. Next day delivery. The delivery process is exceptional. Automated call giving you a 2 hour time frame. Followup email that allows you to track the delivery location and eta. Then anether phone when they are ten minutes away.
